welcome.title: Welcome Message
welcome.description: Hover over each test to see what it measures.

imposed.title: Imposed Persona
imposed.description: Shows how your environment pushes you in various aspects.

surface.title: Surface Persona
surface.description: Shows where you are motivated to spend your energy in dreveryday life.

innate.title: Innate Persona
innate.description: Your baseline inner drive profile beneath the surface.

report.title: Final Report
report.description: A full synthesis of all persona layers.

tester.note: Complete a short test pack to unlock 10 days of full access.

progress.title: Take Tests & Get Summary
progress.hint: Start with Imposed, then Surface and Innate, then view your Summary Report.

jung.label: Jung Personality Trait Analysis
jung.description: Surface vs. innate persona analysis across four Jung dimensions.

relationship.label: Ideal Relationship Analysis
relationship.description: Understand how your ideal partner's persona profile.

drain.label: Energy Drain and Adaptation Analysis
drain.description: Identify where your frustration comes from.

profession.label: Occupation Analysis
profession.description: Identify occupations that fit your drive profiles.

footer.blurb: Advanced psychological mapping of innate drives vs. behavioral persona. Premium reports are available for $3.99 per individual unlock.

missingTests.title: Complete all three tests first
missingTests.subtitle: We need your Imposed, Surface, and Innate persona tests before we can build the report.

header.title: Integrated Self Analysis
header.subtitle: A single view of how your environment, surface persona, and innate persona interact.

environment.title: Environment Fit & Structure
environment.subtitle: What the environment demands of your for drives, and how you meet or resist those demands.

metrics.satisfactionTooltip: Average of the drive satisfaction vector.

required.title: Environment Required Drive Profile
required.description: Shows how your environment pushes you in different directions.

imposed.title: Environment Imposed Drive Profile
imposed.description: Shows how you adapt and shift energy across drives to fit the environment.

satisfaction.title: Drive Satisfaction Profile
satisfaction.description: Shows how satisfied you feel in each drive in the current environment.

persona.title: Surface vs Innate Drives
persona.subtitle: Compare what you show outwardly with what feels natural underneath.

surface.title: Surface Drive Profile
surface.description: Shows how you allocate energy in everyday life, both publicly and privately, in ways you consciously recognize.

innate.title: Innate Drive Profile
innate.description: Shows how strong you feel innately in different drives.

jung.title: Jung Trait Snapshot
jung.prompt: Most personality tests use simplified labels to capture a complex personality landscape across a few behavior dimensions. Our drive-based approach offers deeper analysis by distinguishing your Surface and Innate personas, recognizing that behavior is shaped by inner drives, environment, and adaptive strategies. With this approach, we can predict your typical Jung-style behavior label and also explain why people with the same label may look very different once both Surface and Innate personas are considered.

description.rest: profiles can diverge because you use some drives to fulfill other drives. Sometimes this strategy helps you adapt effectively. But when target drives are not satisfied, it can create
description.tail: you can’t easily explain. Find out the reasons for those conflicts or the adaptations that work for you.

profession.title: Profession Fit
profession.description: When your drive profile fits your work environment, you perform best and feel the least stress. Find out top professions based on your current energy spending pattern.

relationship.title: Ideal Relationship Profile
relationship.description: Ever wonder what qualities your ideal partner should possess? We can estimate an idealized profile based on the strength of your needs across drives, considering both your Surface and Innate personas.

footer.note: Reports are adaptive summaries, not medical or clinical diagnoses.
